summary: Provides core infrastructure for defining, registering, and managing static application security testing (SAST) checks, including an abstract base class that standardizes check metadata (severity, categories, parameters) and a central registry that loads check definitions, supports external directories, and configures runner filters for execution.
business_intent: To enable consistent creation, organization, and execution of SAST security checks within the tool, allowing extensibility and centralized management of check metadata and execution filtering.
